name: Midnight Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

description: Deep in the snowy forests bordering the kingdom, villagers tell tales of a mysterious icefox who, under the light of the midnight moon, becomes human. What they don't know is that this fox, Ahri, was once a princess. Cursed to live a life as wild as her heart, she runs through the forests during the day, hoping to find someone to break her eternal curse.
